## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G27080](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G27080)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>NHL13</u>
- **Gene Name:** NDR/HIN1-like 13
- **Description:**   Late embryogenesis abundant (LEA) hydroxyproline-rich glycoprotein family;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2059274
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
